item.description:
This race features a Barefoot Division.

Sign up under: New England Barefoot Runners.

 

http://www.northshoretimingonline.com/reglivecb.aspx?eventyear_id=68

 

Barefoot is considered truly barefoot, huarches or VFF only. This is a "Barefoot Race within a Race". We need runners!

We have a team. Please sign up under the team when registering for the race. We are under New England Barefoot Runners. See below.

Team Challenge: This is the first year of the Team Challenge. The winning men's team, women's team and coed team will win $100 per team.  When signing up on, select > Join a Team: Pick New England Barefoot Runners from a list of team names on the next page. Please select this as this will be the team to beat.

This is a newly named race but is in its 3rd year. It is part of the Motif #1 Day Festival. The race and festival will be on May 18th, 2013 with the race being held in the morning followed by a great day of festivities in downtown Rockport.
Here is a link to the Motif #1 Day Festival: www.rockportartfestivals.com

For more information, please see: http://www.motif1day5k.org
item.name: Motif #1 Day 5k Road Race , Rockport, MA
